name: Ylt

features.Boss: Ylt can take both a fast turn and a slow turn each round. After an enemy finishes a turn, Ylt can spend 1 focus to immediately use an extra ▶ or ▷. He can spend 1 focus on his turn to remove a condition from himself.
features.Flowing Earth: After Ylt uses the Cohesion surge, he can immediately use Vaulting Stone on himself (no action or Investiture required), though it doesn't grant advantage on his next attack.
features.Taln's Honorblade: Ylt is bonded to the Honorblade of the Herald Taln. If he loses the weapon, he can summon it as ▶ and it reappears at the start of his next fast turn. While not wielding it, he can't use Cohesion and Tension surges.

action.name: Strike: Honorblade
action.description: Attack +5, reach 5 ft., one target. Graze: 11 (2d10) spirit damage. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) spirit damage.

action.name: Vaulting Stone (Costs 1 Investiture)
action.description: Uses Cohesion to create a pillar of stone that propels him or a willing character within 15 feet of him into the air; that character lands in a space up to 15 feet away without triggering Reactive Strikes, and if their next action is a melee attack that attack gains advantage.

action.name: Illusory Flourish (Costs 1 Investiture)
action.description: Targets an enemy he has hit with a melee attack since the end of his last turn, making an Illumination test against their Spiritual defense. On success the target is Disoriented until the end of their next turn.

bi_action.name: Stone Spear (Costs 1 Investiture)
bi_action.description: Cohesion Attack +6, range 60 ft., one target. Graze: 9 (2d8) impact damage. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) impact damage. Ylt can spend an Opportunity to knock the target Prone.

bi_action.name: Regrowth (Costs 1 Investiture)
bi_action.description: Ylt restores 1d6 + 5 health to himself or another he can touch.

free.name: Regenerate (Costs 1 Investiture)
free.description: Ylt recovers 4 (1d6+1) health; he can use this free action even while Unconscious or otherwise prevented from using actions.

reaction.name: Tension Parry (Costs 1 Investiture)
reaction.description: Before Ylt is hit or grazed by an attack against Physical defense, he can infuse Tension into his clothing to increase his Physical defense by 2 until the start of his next turn, including against the triggering attack. If the attack hits, this increase can change it into a miss; if it grazes, he ignores its effects.

tactics: Ylt prefers to use Cohesion and Tension surges to manipulate the battlefield and punish attackers; he uses Vaulting Stone to reposition allies defensively and Offhand Strike to apply pressure.
